title: Ex-BNP lawmaker gets NCP nomination for Sirajganj-5
body: A former BNP lawmaker has secured nomination from the National Citizen Party (NCP) for the Sirajganj-5 (Belkuchi-Chauhali) constituency. ​NCP announced the names of four candidates for Sirajganj today. Maj (retd) Monjur Kader, also a former state minister, bagged the nomination for Sirajganj-5 constituency, while ​Dilshan Ara Parul for Sirajganj-3, Duti Aronno Chowdhury for Sirajganj-4 and ​SM Sayeed Mostafiz for Sirajganj-6. ​NCP has not yet declared candidates for the Sirajganj-1 and Sirajganj-2 constituencies. ​Monjur Kader was elected with BNP nomination from Sirajganj-5 in 2001 national election.
